text.#text: Except as provided in

If,
			 for any quarter, the total number of Federal employees exceeds the applicable
			 maximum for such quarter, then, until the first succeeding quarter for which
			 such total number is determined not to exceed the applicable maximum for such
			 succeeding quarter, reductions shall be made through both attrition and a
			 freeze on appointments.
For purposes of this Act—
